text: The 1973–74 Scottish Inter-District Championship was a rugby union competition for Scotland's district teams.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W. Forsyth Princes Street, Edinburgh & Renfield Street, Glasgow. 1973. This season saw the 21st Scottish Inter-District Championship. Glasgow District won the competition with 3 wins.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W.
